name: Compost Conundrum
description:
An educational game made in 4 weeks. Players swipe to move a worm through layers of compost,  in an attempt to make the soil healthier.

Swipe/Drag the mouse in any direction in order to move the worm in that direction.

Developed By Graphite Lab Intern Class 2018

Abram Donovan - Programmer

Sarah Brill - Artist

Chloe Schwarzen - Artist

Warren Guiles - Game Designer 

Made in Unity
